website_summaries.verdict: A versatile basic tie rack from a well-known brand that offers excellent value for the cost.
pros: Users praise this tie rack for how easy it is to install
We love that it's simple and easy to see
You can access any of your ties at a glance
Can be installed in virtually any closet
cons: One customer commented on needing additional wall anchors to install
Some felt the hooks were too close together

customer_reviews.title: I use it for my necklaces! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use to hang my necklaces on. It is perfect!! I had been searching trying to find the perfect thing and this did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Morris Case

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I purchased these. They are very sturdy and good quality. I put these on the wall of my closet and hung all of my spaghetti strap tank tops on one and on the second one I hung all of my necklaces, bangles and even rings. I love them. Makes it easy to keep everything organized and nothing slips off of it. Would buy these again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Datty

customer_reviews.title: Great jewelry organizer (neckties, too)
customer_reviews.text: This rack is just what I needed. My necklaces, bracelets, and anklets were in a knotted pile on top of my dresser. Now everything is organized and easy to select. I looked at other racks specifically made for jewelry but like the simple style and reasonable price of this one best. It comes with mounting screws. The pegs are long enough to hold multiple items, and the two rows are staggered to separate items. My husband uses an identical rack for his neckties.
customer_reviews.author: Mausita

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry Rack
customer_reviews.text: I use this tie rack to hang jewelry. I hung it on the inside of a closet door. It works fine for the purpose. I've attached a photo.
customer_reviews.author: Dorene R.

customer_reviews.title: hanging necklaces
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many ways to store my necklaces that are thin chains. I am pretty certain I've found the perfect solution. I love this. I hung it in the closet over my small jewelry armoire/chest. This hanger allows me to see what I have without it all getting tangled. It was simple to install and came with the hardware that is needed to do the job. My closet is a little happier with this hanging in it ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Jenn K.

customer_reviews.title: For TIES, great, belts, NO
customer_reviews.text: I bought this strictly for belts, I have a LOT of belts. This had a lot of hooks but they are way too close together. I expected it to be wider. Guess I will have them hanging very close together or give it to the wife for her a jewelry hanger. Not much good to me for belts. Even if I hang them "looped" over, they'd take up the one it's on and the one on either side. Pitifully close together. Looked up belt hangers and this one came up. Wrong category for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jim C.

customer_reviews.title: Closet Maid Indeed!
customer_reviews.text: I've been having a time trying to have my necklaces organized and STAY untangled. For one, I'll admit, I have too many necklaces and most I do not wear. The sad thing is that I keep buying more!!! Anyway, I do have a few single and double hooks on my closet door to ATTEMPT to keep my necklaces organized. Needless to say, they have not been working out. Time skip to now after I purchased this item, it has been keeping my necklaces untangled and organized.
customer_reviews.author: TeaCupRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Very good Product
customer_reviews.text: I usually read the 1 star reviews to see what's the worst of the product I might find. A couple of reviews said the hooks snapped off easily.. So the first thing I did when I got it was to jiggle the pieces to see if they came off. They did not even after applying a little force. I hung it up on the wall and put all my ties on the hooks and my belts on the end hooks. I seldom give 5 stars because it's hard to get emotionally attached to some thing so simple, unless it wildly exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great scarf organizer!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit wary about buying this because it looked a bit too compact to hold everything well, but its doing its job. 100% sturdy - The screws sit in there very nicely, we wiggled it quite a few times and it was a nice tight fit. Like I said, the biggest downside is the fact that the pegs are very close together. I had a lot of trouble finding a scarf rack that had them more spread apart and sat on the wall. This one definitely works though.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, strong, compact, and organized finally
customer_reviews.text: I can't describe my hatred towards those tie hangers that hang on the clothing rack and all the ties constantly fall off because it's wonky. I decided for $8, this tie rack has to be an improvement -- and it is! It took me longer finding the drill than to install it. It looks absolutely fabulous. Although it's compact, it holds so many times! I didn't double up but I'm sure ties could be without any issues. I have already sent the link to the men in my family because they need this!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L

customer_reviews.title: GUYS: Your wife will love this!
customer_reviews.text: My wife had been nagging me every couple months about not being able to hang stuff in her closet. To my wife's surprise, I ordered & easily installed a couple of these in her closet (along with a couple of stackable shoe racks) & she can now hang all her many belts and scarves on the prongs. I hope you've found this review helpful. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Chippy The Chipmunk

customer_reviews.title: The rack handles many, many items.
customer_reviews.text: They went up easy as you please. The rack looks fine sand it has so much capacity the entire area is now neat and organized. Sturdy, well made, will clean easily. The price was certainly right. I think I need another in my crafting area to hold lengths of beads. They will be much easier to store and select what I need when they are all visible. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my closet.
customer_reviews.text: I have two dozen sets of suspenders and they usually end up on the closet floor. I had tried keeping them on hangers but I couldn't find strong enough hangers. When I saw this Closet Maid rack I knew I'd finally get some order in my closet. I now have all my suspenders in one place. I use the larger size paper clips to keep them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Wudwkr

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my costume jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I hung this on the back wall of my closet for my costume jewelry, so that I could see it and access it easily. It works our very well for that. I can see everything and it is easy to choose what I want. I just slide the clothes on hangers over a bit and choose what I want. Great organizing tool.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping those belts tidy, plenty of space.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for belt storage. We don't use it for ties but I'm sure it would work just fine. We've installed it behind the bedroom door as there is not enough room in our closet. It's easy to install, you just need a screw driver (or small drill).
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffin Jr

customer_reviews.title: These racks are fantastic. I can easily fit 2 to 3 ties ...
customer_reviews.text: These racks are fantastic. I can easily fit 2 to 3 ties per rung and it is easy to see them to pick out the right one I need. I use the end rungs for a few belts and then have another one of these tie racks for the rest of my belts. I hate the tie racks and belt racks that hang from your closet. most of them are worthless and take up hanging space...these racks tuck neatly inside my closet or on a wall behind a door. The whole thing is coated and the rungs have an extra rubber tip so you don't have to worry about snagging your good silk ties.
customer_reviews.author: BARRY

customer_reviews.title: We have 4 and the others ones are holding up just fine, so perhaps that one was just a lemon
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for ties and belts. We put them on the back of the door of our small closets and it does add very handy storage that allows you to see each of the ties. My only complaint is that 1-2 of the hooks broke off with very little pressure. We have 4 and the others ones are holding up just fine, so perhaps that one was just a lemon. Very reasonably priced, easy to install and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: EVSHK

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for those that need a tie or belt rack but don't have a lot of closet space. These have been drilled to the back wall of the closet behind my trousers. Metal, solid construction. I had tried plastic rotating tie racks in the past and they fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: NKA

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and Holds a Lot
customer_reviews.text: The review title says it all. This is a nicely made, lightweight organizer for ties and belts...or scarves. It's fine in our closet, helped us get orderly. It was easy to put up, study once mounted and holds all the stuff we normally had on shelves. Bottom line is I'd buy it again...
customer_reviews.author: JP Folkes

customer_reviews.title: Great belt hanger
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hang belts in my closet. I like that I can hang each belt separately. With a lot of other belt hangers I've tried the belts hang over each other. The get bunched up and hard to see. You also have to move belts ti get to the ones underneath. Super easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Indenbom

customer_reviews.title: Lots of wasted hooks. Overall though it's a nice tie rack
customer_reviews.text: I hung this in my closet on the wall. It holds all of my ties. I guess I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 stars for one reason. The hooks are just a little too close to each other. It's hard to see the actual tie that you are looking for. And if your hanging belts, then they are definitely too close. Lots of wasted hooks. Overall though it's a nice tie rack n
customer_reviews.author: Richard Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I have several.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these I use to hang my various scarves on and it's great. I'm also an avid bra shopper and needed a convenient place for them so I didn't have to dig through a drawer to find the one I wanted. This works perfect. I can easily see what I want and grab it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Using it to store my necklaces
customer_reviews.text: I have an over-the-door jewelry armoire that I love except that is doesn't like the big beaded necklaces. Its just not deep enough to accommodate these so I needed something else but something that didn't take up a lot of space. This is working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Office Mom

customer_reviews.title: Loving this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this tie holder. I am using it for my necklaces and it's doing a great job of keeping them organized and not tangled. It was very easy to install as well. I used shorter screws and no sinks as I screwed this into a piece of wood but it's holding quite well. I definitely recommend this product, especially for those who want to use it outside the box. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: this fits & displays all my necklaces for easy access. No more tangled messes!
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: great necklace holder! (guess you could use it for belts...)
customer_reviews.text: My long necklaces were a hopeless tangle in my drawer, and I got tired of separating out the one I wanted each day. This hanger solved the problem. It's hanging in my closet: I put the long ones on the bottom row of hooks and the shorter ones on the top. Recommend. mb
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for Hanging Jewelry
customer_reviews.text: These little racks are fantastic multi-purpose items. I have two hanging with necklaces in a walk-in closet. They're right at eye-level; I can see everything; it's handy and simple and out of the way. Also can be used as a tie rack! :-D Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Layne

customer_reviews.title: Use as a key rack
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these for ties. I use them to keep my keys, lanyards an carabiners organized. They have lots of space, slots and "hooks" to hang everything on and take up little room on my walls.
customer_reviews.author: Yes I'm addicted

customer_reviews.title: Great Tie Rack
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of ties (too many probably but I wear them a lot for work) and needed a way to hang them at the back of our closet. I looked at a bunch of options, but had to have something less than 16" long. This had a bunch of hooks, was the perfect size and was super easy to install. Holds all my ties (and a few belts too).
customer_reviews.author: BubbaZanetti

customer_reviews.title: Hang most anything on it
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these. One is holding various electronics cables and tools, one has ties and belts, and one has medals from 5ks. These are great for hanging most anything that will fit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sneed

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT WRENCH HOLDER
customer_reviews.text: iI was able to hang all my ASE and metric wrenches on this tie/belt rack and it works great. ASE on top, metric on bottom.I was also able to mount this on my pegboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We used this for my daughters headbands. It wasn’t the prettiest thing to look at but she had so many headbands that this was almost completely blocked from view! It was sturdy and worth it
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for necklaces and my BF has all of his ties on one. This is cheap, matches boring white closet doors, and allows you to hang a lot of items in a little space!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: very nice - not perfect but very functional and useful.  small
customer_reviews.text: a little small. there is a lot they could do to improve it but for a small rack it works perfect and i will probably buy more. of course i use mine for more than for just ties and belts so i wish it was bigger but for just ties and belts it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: the Jukebox Man

customer_reviews.title: Im glad i did
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my Necklaces. Im glad i did, its the perfect size, holds everything perfectly. I will purchase more when needed in the future!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great product design
customer_reviews.text: I installed this tie and belt rack into my husband's closet to hold his multitude of ties that had previously been slung over every odd hanger in his closet. What a difference! This rack holds over 20 ties, and keeps them visible but neat. It also has a hook with a rubberized cap at each end of the rack to hold belts. I love the efficient design of this product -- how it holds so much in a relatively small space.
customer_reviews.author: LADesigner

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing necklaces
customer_reviews.text: I have many necklaces that that I buy from accessory stores. If I'm not careful, they tangle easily. I hung this tie rack up with wall hanging nails rather than the enclosed nails. It worked great and I avoided making a big hole in my walls. This was perfect for the necklaces. My daughter asked for one when she saw how neat it looked so I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great for jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I like to hang my necklaces and bracelets and have so many this comes in really handy. The second one I've ordered for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: ladyjean

customer_reviews.title: Works as a necklace rack!
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't use this for ties, but for my many necklaces. I purchased 2 and have already filled them up and should probably order 2 more. I put them in the back of my walk in closet so now I can coordinate with my clothes. Would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed because my belts were ...
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed because my belts were everywhere and I had them looped on the necks of hangers. Now they are easier to get to and take up less space. Instead of mounting the rack on a wall, I used a couple of S-hooks to hang this on my slatted closet door.
customer_reviews.author: Nekogeisha

customer_reviews.title: It really works well very easy to see everything all neatly organized
customer_reviews.text: Hid and hung this behind my bedroom door to give me more closet space.It really works well very easy to see everything all neatly organized.I would recommend getting this. Easy to install hardware included. If you have any questions, please feel free to ask me. If you found my review helpful, let me know and click YES.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Used for Purses Also!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife & she loves them! Worked out great using these for hanging her wristlets & purses up!
customer_reviews.author: Jpunishu2

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my needs. I hung all of my belts on it. (I think there were at least 25 or thirty.) This was easy to hang. I did expect the wire of the product to be a little heavier but I guess it didn't need to be since it worked fine. If I get more belts, I would buy another. (This is so much better than the 'Belt hanger' that I had my belts on. It was awkward and took up a few inches of rod space in my closet. Not to mention it was a trick trying to get the belt I wanted off it without dropping all the others.) This product eliminates that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Herbal Girl

customer_reviews.title: Really Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cute little rack. I have all of my boyfriend's ties and belts on them, as well as my belts, two umbrellas, and a stethoscope. I have this hanging by two push-pins, and it hasn't fallen all year! You could even use it for jewelry or small scarves/headbands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accessories hooks
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a jewelry hanger in my bathroom and it works perfect. It’s perfect for necklaces, ties, or even scarfs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn Dube

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tie/belt rack.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to mount with included screws and drywall anchors. Would be a 5-star if there were more space between each hook/hanger. Belt buckle takes up 2 hooks for one belt.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver.
customer_reviews.text: This is so great for me. I needed something to hang in the back of my closet to hang my ties and belts. I have to stretch my space since my closet is almost full so this worked great. I installed to the back wall and clothing hides it completely.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: We have limited closet space and this was a great way for him to have a place to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as his ties were starting to be all over the place. We have limited closet space and this was a great way for him to have a place to put his ties without taking too much space. We have had it for 3 years already and it's still as when we first got it. GREAT purchase!! Excellent quality and at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for necklaces
customer_reviews.text: I love this rack to organize my necklaces, I just used command hooks instead of drilling holes in my wall and it’s just looks so lovely and it reminds me to stay organized!!
customer_reviews.author: robert pliszka

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose/easy organizer
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought 2 to hang my necklaces on so I can see them all and find the perfect one. They work so well! I love them. Keeps everything organized and keeps my necklaces from getting tangled.
customer_reviews.author: TeenyJewel

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased a few of these and use them daily for jewelry, bras, belts, pajamas, reusable shopping bags and more.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl L Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Works great for young boy
customer_reviews.text: Nothing super fancy but we bought this for our seven year old boy who needs to hand up his school uniform belts and ties. Holds many items!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the closet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and basic rack for my ties and bow ties. Huge upgrade for me from letting them just lay in a basket. I have my hung with zip ties, but the hardware (2 screws and 2 wall anchors) are provided if need to be wall mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Barrett Kibble

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted inside my closet.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of storage for my ties. Screws were just a little longer than I anticipated, and the tips poked through my skinny door just a hair.
customer_reviews.author: DWJ

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective product.
customer_reviews.text: Attached this to the back of door. Sturdy and can organize my junks like belts, ties and hang empty bags. Great!
customer_reviews.author: d_Rav

customer_reviews.title: Glad i bought them
customer_reviews.text: Got these when we redid our closet. Soo glad i did. Had them for months and never put them up. Wow they hold so much more and help keep the ties out of the way
customer_reviews.author: krystal alvarez

customer_reviews.title: As promised!
customer_reviews.text: This is true to what i expected. However, when it arrived, it was missing the two 2) "S" hooks that were supposed to be on each side of the rack. Amazon recommended that I call Closet Maid directly and they were awesome! They immediately made it right "just as promised" by shipping a replacement overnight. I would definitely order this and other items again from ClosetMaid!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just a tie rack
customer_reviews.text: I used this to organize my necklaces. It works great! Now I can see them all at a glance and they don't get tangled like they did in my jewelry box. I live in an apartment, so I did not use the screws provided. Instead, I hung it with 2 3M hooks. Updated: I have just purchased my 2nd one to hold some more jewelry that I've acquired. Still love it!
customer_reviews.author: chelle493

customer_reviews.title: happy
customer_reviews.text: easy installation, ive never mounted anything myself before and this was a good thing to start off with. you're gonna need a powerdrill, hammer and level maybe a measuring tape. I'm currently using it as a necklace holder and it is definitely serving its purpose, my jewelry is now neatly organized and tangle free !
customer_reviews.author: Brian Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I found this rack more than adequate to support an array of ties and it took under a minute to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I use this "Tie and Belt" Rack in my closet for my necklaces and belt. It's perfect for the small space I have, it keeps my necklaces out of the way and safe from being tangles, and was really easy to install. It's not pretty, but who cares? It serves the purpose that I bought it for, and I would recommend to anyone. Would also work well for it's intended purpose--to hold ties and belts. The two larger pegs on the ends are the only place a belt will fit, but you can stack them. I would probably hold 4-6 belts, and plenty of ties (or necklaces!).
customer_reviews.author: Debbie E

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy again and recommend! I used this to hand necklaces and bracelets
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy again and recommend! I used this to hand necklaces and bracelets. The grip is great and helps me hold a lot of things. I love storing jewelry on my wall instead of tangled up inside a drawer. It works so well and it looks really good on my wall. I used 3M strips to hold it up, so my wall wouldn't get damaged. It hung up easily and isn't too heavy for the strips. It comes with the hanging supplies if you do want to put holes in your wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and organize in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Used for my sons ties. Worked perfectly. Easy to install...organized us in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: JakeJS

customer_reviews.title: Great value, super functional
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my ties and belts. Absolutely love it. Great capacity, great form factor, easy to install. I'd recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Liebner

customer_reviews.title: Great for necklaces
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these in my closet to hold not ties but necklaces. Works perfectly for this purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile item; works great for necklaces!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang my necklaces on. It works great! It is definitely a versatile item. Since the included screws would not go into the door I put it up on (due to the material of the door), I just used Command Strips, and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: H.R

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband always leaves his belts all over the floor so this was the most perfect addition to our closet!!! Great to hang scarves, purses, belts or or ties!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the outcome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to hang my necklaces and I love the outcome. Easy to install, has 27 coated prongs on which to hang necklaces. I wasn't looking for anything fancy or decorative, but have to say I like the appearance of this.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Reed

customer_reviews.title: Small but an organizing must!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my husband's ties, belts and watches. It made a huge difference in our closet which is hardly big enough for both of us. He loves it! Was easy to hang and he fit over 25 ties on them.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: but they would always overlap and I would "misplace" the good ties. Also
customer_reviews.text: Everything is organized, everything is neat, and my ties stay wrinkle free! I used to keep all my ties around a coat hangar, but they would always overlap and I would "misplace" the good ties. Also, when the ties used to overlap, they would always get wrinkled and ironing a tie is a pain in my rear-end... This hangar solved all my problems and even got one for the Mrs. for her belts, which are way more organized and easily accessible too!
customer_reviews.author: Stanly

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, and it's sturdy. I'm using it to hang my belts, so far no issues.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing ties
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to organize my husbands millions of ties. It’s easy to install—we actually just used a regular nail. Plus it helps keep things looking organized.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and holds a lot of ties.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient. Keeps all the ties in one place and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: Not just for ties and belts!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hanging necklaces. We attached it to the side of my daughter’s large dresser and now she can see all her necklaces and choose a different one to wear to school each day.
customer_reviews.author: carmel_mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. We use one for ties, and another for belts.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I use these to hang necklaces to save room on my dresser. They are very lightweight and actually will stay on the wall with thumbtacks even though it comes with the screws to hang it properly.
customer_reviews.author: rednappingcat

customer_reviews.title: Simple organization
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby and he uses it for belts and ties. It’s much easier to see each item compared to the old hangars he used.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my closet door, maybe not the best for belts.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Easy to install, sturdy, durable, and gives you a good amount of hooks for your different items. This is my second purchase! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Vera

customer_reviews.title: Holds ties
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what else to say about this. Holds multiple ties. Has a couple of bigger hooks for belts or more ties.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great for long necklaces, too.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, simple rack that my wife wanted for her "fun" necklace collection. It's a great way to keep them from getting tangled, and takes up very little space on the closet wall. Easy to install, but i recommend using a better wall anchor and a level for a pro installation. Nicely made, and arrived very fast. Thanks for making my wife happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great for ties and belts
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and holds a great amount of ties and belts.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I like the rubberized tips
customer_reviews.text: I like the rubberized tips, and also the fact that you can mount this with or without the anchors, depending on what you're mounting it to. Excellent product, yet simple.
customer_reviews.author: Burt Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist rack that does its job well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple tie rack that does its job well. Great capacity and fits close to the wall where I mounted it, keeping it out of the way but easy to access. The hooks on the end are great for belts.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my necklaces!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Comes with screws and wall plugs for hanging. I've got every hook filled, with necklaces ranging from dainty to big, chunky pieces - there's plenty of room and no issue with it holding or bending under the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: My New Scarf Racks !
customer_reviews.text: Bought a couple of these for my new closet to hold scarves, and they work perfectly for that. I managed to get a lot of scarves on them and arranged them by color. Easy to install. I think they might work for ties and belts as well. Shipped promptly in a box loose.
customer_reviews.author: Art and Soul

customer_reviews.title: Simple elegance
customer_reviews.text: Simple and sturdy. Surpasses my other tie and belt racks.
customer_reviews.author: Jules Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have a few of these for about a year, they work great and keep the closet clean. I sent think the whole lines up with studs, but its n ok t much weight anyway
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: I feel so organized.
customer_reviews.text: I got these to organize some jewelry and my husbands ties and I feel like our closet is so organized now. these are also really reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Amberrrrrrrrrrrr

customer_reviews.title: I love it, keeps them tangled free
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my necklaces, I love it, keeps them tangled free.
customer_reviews.author: mom2acutiepie

customer_reviews.title: Item as Described, But Arrived Bent
customer_reviews.text: Tie rack was exactly what I order BUT the product, which came in a bubble envelope was bent almost in c shape. I usually get stuff in Amazon boxes and was surprised that it did not come in a box. At least I was able to bend it back to a somewhat straight shape to hang on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item, have 4 of them now and they're holding all sorts of items. Rubber tips protect items put on them and keeps slippage to a minimum, Like that it only takes a few inches of closet space.
customer_reviews.author: doobie

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I kept it because I need to organized my belts but it should be more space in between each hanger. Some belt buckles are bigger than others.
customer_reviews.author: Lisset Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Great for necklaces
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to hang my necklaces on. Seems quite sturdy, arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn DumondTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: sturdy for its size
customer_reviews.text: i use it for a few belts and ties. it works and very slim width wise so it fits practically anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: simple, perfect, just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: i already had one of these and needed more as they only hold so many ties/belts. even though there are lots of hooks you wont really use every single one as you need space to see each tie and belts take up more than one hook. Its very sturdy and works exceptionally well for what it is designed for just keep in mind you will probably want more than one if you have a decent number of ties/belts to organize. easy to install, just two screws into the wall/door and your done.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean.rodeo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to hang all of my Norwex cloths. Works AWESOME 😎
customer_reviews.author: Sauce57Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good but on the smaller side
customer_reviews.text: This looks like pretty good quality. It's certainly smaller than it looks in the picture. It's on my nightstand in this pic.
customer_reviews.author: MBM323

customer_reviews.title: I use this to organize necklaces
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, installed them inside my clothes closet, and hang my large assortment of necklaces and beads on them. Quick and easy to pick one to go with whatever outfit I am deciding to wear.
customer_reviews.author: KittyMama

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I use this a necklace holder to keep my necklaces from becoming tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Perdue

product_meta.title: ClosetMaid 8051 Tie and Belt Rack, White
product_meta.description: ClosetMaid has a full line of accessories for both inside and outside the closet. These accessories create storage solutions for many places in your home. The 27-hook Tie & Belt rack can be installed on a wall or door to provide organized storage for your ties and belts.
feature_bullets: Hooks can be used to organize ties, belts and other accessories
Mounts on door or wall; Installation hardware included
Lightweight and sturdy construction includes rubber coated tips
Measures approximately 3.5" H x 15" W x 2.38" D
